channel.title: Need help with rotated bitmaps
channel.description: how would i get SCAR to find a rotated bitmap? is there already a command for it or must i create a function? if the latter is true, would someone mind helping do it, because i am not good at all at creating my own.

item.title: Need help with rotated bitmaps
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

^
Sounds good to me, I don’t have much experience with any rotation, But only reason I can think for rotating a bitmap is for minimap things so I would suggets Dynamic DTM’s for that

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with rotated bitmaps
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

dont use bitmaps, try to use a dtm, they are way faster then a rotated bitmap

Read full topic

item.description:
@gokon wrote:

thank you very much Nashi
and in case you were wondering, i needed this for a game called coolio DJ which can be found on armorgames.com

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with rotated bitmaps
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]function FindBitmapRotated(bitmap: Integer; var x, y, Angle: Integer; x1, y1, x2, y2: Integer): Boolean;
Works like FindBitmap, but rotates the bitmap after each search by 1 degree and returns the angle
of the found bitmap afterwards.

function RotateBitmap(bitmap: Integer; angle: Extended): Integer;
Rotates bitmap by specified angle in radians (Pi = 180˚);[/code]

Those functions might help?

Read full topic
